title: The Gerent Saga
overview: Since ancient times, the Lingzhou Continent was ruled by the Emperor of the Emperor, and guarded by the eight princes, until the tyranny of the Emperor of the Eight Generations. After the nine generations of the emperor came to the throne, the princes have been born with the heart of not being courtiers, the nations fought openly and secretly, the underworld merchants took advantage of the opportunity to make chaos, a common people's catastrophe was unveiled, and several young heroes stepped into this chaotic chess game with unknown fate.
